Response: The clinical leadership development initiative is not on track because our chief medical officer (CMO) resigned during the current year. The interim CMO has limited ability to influence behavior changes.  We have started sharing data; however, not at the level we planned at this point in time due to the implementation of our new EHR.  We are on track with the hiring of the RN After-care Care Coordinator.
Unanticipated challenges with the EHR and physician engagement is a concern as well as the RN After-care coordinator focusing on various episodes and not solely sepsis.
